title: Ragnarok Again - Novel Updates
tags: Beast Companions   Death of Loved Ones   Gods   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters
author: 메론티
description:
[Ting! You’ve received a new quest.]

Baek Ho-jin’s face crumpled at the sound that ringed in his head.

“What are you doing now?”

[A new quest…]

“What are you doing?” 

When Ho-jin asked again, a voice with a deep echo answered calmly. 

[I’m imitating what people read in novels these days. Humans love this kind of thing.]

A voice that didn’t understand its fault.

“Stop the useless talk and get to the point.”

[Boring human.]

“I’m not boring.”

Ho-jin forced a smile and continued.

“So what do I have to do now?”

[What? Of course…] 

The voice inside Ho-jin growled like a wolf. 

[You’re going to kill God.]>
